AK::IAkRTPCSubscriber
SetParam
~IAkRTPCSubscriber
virtual AKRESULT AK::IAkRTPCSubscriber::SetParam ( AkPluginParamID  in_paramID,
const void *  in_pParam,
AkUInt32  in_uParamSize 
) [pure virtual]

This function will be called to notify the subscriber every time a selected value is entered or modified

Returns:
AK_Success if successful, AK_Fail otherwise
Parameters:
in_paramID Plug-in parameter ID
in_pParam Parameter value pointer
in_uParamSize Parameter size
